detail_desc: Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Top in sweatshirt fabric decorated with studs. Long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Hat and mittens in a cable-knit cotton blend containing some wool. Hat with a faux fur pompom on top, ribbed hem and earflaps with ties. Mittens with a ribbed foldover edge at the wrist. Fleece lining.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Empire-line dress in textured, double-weave organic cotton with flutter sleeves and buttons down the front. Lined at the top.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a gathered V-neck, pleat at the front, slit at the cuffs, and rounded hem.
Long-sleeved nursing top in jersey crêpe with a wrapover front and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Short, sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with pleats at the top and a small opening at the back. Lined.

Mesh top with a yoke and sleeves in transparent mesh. Short, frill-trimmed sleeves, frills at the top that continue over the shoulders, and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Jersey lining.
Fine-knit polo-neck jumper in soft merino wool with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short dress in an airy weave with a wide, elasticated neckline, long raglan sleeves, elasticated seam at the waist and flounce at the hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Jumper in a jacquard-knit wool blend with long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Trousers in a lightweight weave with a high, elasticated waist, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. Detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Large scarf in a soft weave with short fringes along the edges.

Long shirt in airy chiffon with notch lapels with decorative buttons and a diagonal zip down the front. Decorative shoulder tabs, long sleeves, a detachable tie belt at the waist and zipped fake pockets at the top and sides. Unlined.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in soft cotton jersey with lace details. Top with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.

Long-sleeved top in stretch cotton jersey with a V-neck, raw-edge neckline and open chest pocket. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a V-neck, buttons at the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Dance dress in glossy jersey with a glittery print, a seam at the waist and a layered tulle skirt. Lined skirt.
Short dress in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves and a seam at the waist with narrow, concealed elastication. Deep neckline and a double-layered front for easier nursing access.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with long dolman sleeves. V-neck with a rolled edge, decorative seam front and back and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Gently flared top in soft viscose jersey with short sleeves and a rounded hem.

Short dress in an airy weave with pin-tucks at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist, bell-shaped skirt, and lace details at the cuffs and hem. Jersey inner dress.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved dress in an airy weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with pleats and an asymmetric skirt. Unlined.
Vest tops in stretch cotton jersey. Regular Fit.

Boots in soft imitation suede made from partly recycled polyester with visible seams. Soft elastic shaft with a loop at the back and block heels. Linings and insoles in satin made from recycled polyester. Heels 5 cm.
Calf-length dress in jersey crêpe with a square neckline and long puff sleeves. Gathers at one side to create a draped effect, and a wrapover skirt with a slit at the front. Lined front.
Padded gilet in woven fabric with a lined hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs.
Top in airy cotton jersey with a wide neckline and two flounces in woven fabric on the sleeves.
Joggers in soft, washed cotton denim. Loose fit with a ribbed, drawstring waist, fake front pockets and gently tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Trainers in imitation leather with a pile-covered hook and loop fastening at the front with an embroidered motif, and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Long-sleeved tops in soft, pointelle-knit organic cotton jersey with a button placket and embroidered scalloped trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, concealed button placket, flap chest pockets, 3/4-length sleeves and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Sandals in imitation leather with decorative appliqués, a tab with a hook and loop fastening, and rubber soles.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a button placket, two chest pockets with decorative studs, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Jumpsuit in an airy viscose weave with a lace yoke and an opening with a pearly button at the back of the neck. Short lace sleeves with a flounce, an elasticated seam and sewn-in fabric tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in soft, printed stretch denim with an elasticated drawstring waist and elastication at the hems.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sports set with a sports top and pair of sports shorts in fast-drying, functional fabric. Short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Jumper in a cable-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with plastic beads. Length 2-4 cm.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in soft crinkled jersey made from recycled polyester. Smocking at the top and hem, decorative buttons down the front and long, wide sleeves with elasticated cuffs.

LOVE STORIES x H&M. Soft, non-wired bra in patterned microfibre with lined, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Lace trim around the cups and an elastic trim at the hem. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Treggings in imitation leather with an elasticated waist.
Fitted top in soft stretch pima cotton jersey with a wide neckline and long sleeves.
Hat in a printed weave with reflective details, a turned-up peak, earflaps and a hook and loop fastening under the chin. Lining in faux fur and fleece.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Jacket in soft faux fur with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and back pockets.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed shawl collar, buttons down the front, fake front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless top in a plumeti-weave viscose blend with a V-neck at the front and stand-up collar with a drawstring.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in stretch jersey made from a cotton blend with a collar and button placket. Slim fit.
Metal earrings in various designs, one pair with feathers. Sizes from 0.3 to 10 cm.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a small embroidery detail on the chest.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in jersey with a V-neck and twisted detail with a draped effect and cut-out section at the top. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and wide, straight legs. Unlined.

Set with a blouse and pair of trousers in an airy weave. Blouse with an elasticated neckline, buttons down the front and short butterfly sleeves. Trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Voluminous blouse in an airy ramie weave with a wide neckline that has an adjustable drawstring. Wide, 3/4-length dolman sleeves with gathers and an adjustable drawstring with long ties. Long slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.

Ankle-length trousers in twill with pleats at the front to create a relaxed fit. High waist, a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a low crotch. Diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets with a button, and gently tapered legs.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length, sleeveless dress in a crinkled viscose weave with smocking over the bust, adjustable shoulder straps and decorative buttons down the front. Unlined.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and reflective details. Elastication at the back of the waist, press-studs at the sides, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Metal hair clips in various designs, two of which are slides. Length from 6.5 cm to 7 cm.
Double-layered, cropped sleeveless top in soft jersey with a sweetheart neckline, decorative knot at the front and seam under the bust.
Jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed polo neck, cable-knit section at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Suede boots with gently rounded toes, soft, supple shafts and covered block heels. Fabric insoles. Heel approx. 8.5 cm.

Gently tailored, padded jacked in woven fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, zipped side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined. Polyester filling.
